mapper.select: select board_code, order_code, title, content, regist_date, member_code, member_id, order_date, payment_amount, payment_state, delivery_code, buy_confirm_state, product_code, style_code, `size`, order_count, color, product_name, brand_code, gender, product_category_code, material, season, made_date, sell_Price, brand_name, product_main_image, image_code, image from vw_myReview where board_code=#{boardCode};

select R1.* FROM( select board_code, order_code, title, content, regist_date, member_code, member_id, order_date, payment_amount, payment_state, delivery_code, buy_confirm_state, product_code, style_code, `size`, order_count, color, product_name, brand_code, gender, product_category_code, material, season, made_date, sell_Price, brand_name, product_main_image, image_code, image from vw_myReview where member_id =#{memberId} and board_code is not null order by regist_date desc ) R1 LIMIT #{pageSearch}, #{cntPerPage };
